scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains one motion picture, ca. 1960, Faulkner at Virginia,16 mm, B & W. The visual portion of the film is composed to still photographs (see photograph items 0148-0223). The soundtrack is composed of excerpts from tape recordings T 106 - T 146 (see acession 6187). The edited soundtrack is also on tape recordings T 576 - T 577 (see sccession 7912-b).
